entry.title: install-theme
entry.content:
How to install octopress theme

cd octopress
git clone git@github.com:tommy351/Octopress-Theme-Slash.git .themes/slash
rake install['slash']
rake generate

Last night I lay in bed looking up at the stars in the sky and I thought to myself, where the heck is the ceiling.

entry.title: markdown 语法示例
entry.content:
这篇博客是参考http://markdown.tw/#p
你妈的，找啦这么久原来是这样添加文内容的，靠，你妹 这篇文章展示啦octopress博客中的各种文档形式。

This is a regular paragraph.

This is a blockquote with two paragraphs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aliquam hendrerit mi posuere lectus. Vestibulum enim wisi, viverra nec, fringilla in, laoreet vitae, risus.

Donec sit amet nisl. Aliquam semper ipsum sit amet velit. Suspendisse id sem consectetuer libero luctus adipiscing.

This is the first level of quoting.

This is nested blockquote.

Back to the first level.

This is a header.

  1. This is the first list item.
  2. This is the second list item.

Here’s some example code:

  return shell_exec("echo $input | $markdown_script");fdfdsfdsjafdsjlfjldskjafljdslajfljdsljfldsjlafjlkdsjafkljdsklfjlkdsjflksjdlakfjdsklfjsdalkj

this is what
  1. Bird
  2. McHale
  3. Parish 1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aliquam hendrerit mi posuere lectus. Vestibulum enim wisi, viverra nec, fringilla in, laoreet vitae, risus.

  4. Donec sit amet nisl. Aliquam semper ipsum sit amet velit. Suspendisse id sem consectetuer libero luctus adipiscing.

  5. A list item with a blockquote:

    This is a blockquote inside a list item.

  6. This is a list item with two paragraphs. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetuer adipiscing elit. Aliquam hendrerit mi posuere lectus.

    Vestibulum enim wisi, viverra nec, fringilla in, laoreet vitae, risus. Donec sit amet nisl. Aliquam semper ipsum sit amet velit.

  7. Suspendisse id sem consectetuer libero luctus adipiscing.
